text: Sir Noël Peirce Coward (16 December 1899 – 26 March 1973) was a British playwright, composer, producer, actor and singer. He was born in Teddington, Middlesex. He was a closeted homosexual.Bio He died of heart failure in Jamaica. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Actors from Middlesex Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:English composers Category:English LGBT people Category:English movie actors Category:English movie producers Category:English playwrights Category:English singers Category:English stage actors Category:English theatre directors Category:Theatre producers Category:Gay men Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT musicians Category:Musicians from Middlesex Category:1899 births Category:1973 deaths
title: Noël Coward
